name: Poison Gas Designator, Obsolete (ObPD-11)
description: The poison gas anti-designator senses marking of a poison gas and targets the designator for attack. The anti-designator can automatically fire a weapon at the designator or await a user's command to do so.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
